textContent:
[Lie of Beauty]
Description: Once upon a time a sister of deceit fell in love prince, she tried her hardest to win his heart with all kinds of deceptions but none of them worked, eventually, tired of her failed attempts she prayed to the daemon of deceit for beauty beyond comprehension, the daemon answered and gave her Lie of Beauty in exchange for her true face, name and identity, a necklace that gave her beauty beyond comprehension. she went to confess to the prince but he did not recognize her. oddly enough even with her boundless beauty, and even not knowing who she was he still rejected her. he told her that he was already secretly engaged towards an other woman in a political marriage. however he also told her that his heart already belonged to another woman, a woman that had been with him, and pursuing him for ages, her previous self. tears of joy welled in her eyes, she tried telling him it was her, but she couldn't the daemon of deceit had already taken her name, face and identity.
Beauty always has its price
